com.horaz.client.util
Class RegExp

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      com.horaz.client.util.RegExp

public final class RegExp
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject

Wrapper for the RegExp JavaScript object. Can be passed as parameter to JSNI methods. Almost all of its methods get inlined. No extra weight.

RegExp literals like /abc/ are not possible. For this we need a Generator that can except parameters which is currently not possible with GWT.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Folke Behrens (fb at toxis. com)

          Wraps the result of any RegExp operation which is either an object or an array of strings.

split

public RegExp.Result split(java.lang.String str,

This split() is different from java.lang.String.split(). The limit is applies after the complete string is split.
